name: No More Boxes
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 31.

4 player party physics deathmatch platformer.

Best with four XBox 360 Controllers.

Each player spawns as one of the characters randomly, each character has a different ability to interact with the boxes, with which they crush their opponents with. Get crushed? Come back as another character randomly and take your revenge!

---------------------------

The theme was "Entire game in one screen". My interpretation was the game could not generate anything new at all - what you started with (in the screen), was exactly what is in the screen, period. Nothing made, nothing taken away.

Enjoy!

----------------------------
